scriptsComments.next-dev: `next dev` starts the application in development mode with hot-code reloading, error reporting, and more
scriptsComments.next-build: `next build` creates an optimized production build of the application
scriptsComments.next-start: `next start` starts the application in production mode. The application should be compiled with `next build` first
scriptsComments.next-export: `next export` allows you to export your app to static HTML, which can be run standalone without the need of a Node.js server
scriptsComments.sanity-build: `sanity build` builds the current Sanity configuration to a static bundle
scriptsComments.sanity-start: `sanity start` start the development server for Sanity Studio (run this command within the studio folder)

scripts.build: npm run sanity-build && pwd && npm run next-build
